# hasUndeterminedDuration

**Instance Property**

Indicates whether the sample has an unknown duration.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasUndeterminedDuration: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the sample’s [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKSample/endDate] property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSDate/distantFuture].

## Accessing the Sample’s Data

- **startDate**: The sample’s start date.
- **endDate**: The sample’s end date.
- **sampleType**: The sample type.
title: hasUndeterminedDuration
